alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 01 at 8:59AM MDT until October 03 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Primary periods for snow accumulations are forecast to be the remainder of Sunday morning as well as from early Monday morning through late Monday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
